summary: Ansgar is a vampire follower converted from my own character.
descriptionHtml:
I created Ansgar from my own vampire character, mostly to get familiar with the Creation Kit.
He\'s a fully functional dual-wielding vampire companion. He\'s also set to essential, auto-level and marriable. He will use melee weapons, bows, and cast Vampiric Drain.

The easiest way to start with Ansgar is to load up the \"Alternate Start - Live Another Life\" mod, and choose to be a vampire in a secluded den. He\'ll be waiting for you just after you exit the den.
(Mara\'s Eye Pond for those who just wish to find him.)

New in 0.7:
Apparently I didn\'t even notice his eyes weren\'t showing properly, they will now be vampire eyes, and use the badass eyes shown in the screenshots if you have BVFE (link below) installed.
I added a few perks to Ansgar after playing with him a bit, notably Silent Roll, Dual Flurry and Light Foot.

Known issues:
His face and body tones are slightly different.
I intended to give him warpaint, but the Creation Kit is not cooperating.
I will create a standalone version once I get the process down and get permission.

I have not included anyone else\'s assets, but in order to make him look the same as the screenshots, you\'ll need the following:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363/?]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38829/?]BVFE - Better Vampire Fangs and Eyes by Aipex8[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16506/?]Vampire Face Less Sunken Cheeks by Devacore [/url] (Male)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9557//?]Alternate Start - Live Another Life by Arthmoor[/url]
author: cjthibs

files.name: Ansgar Vampire Follower
files.changelogHtml:
Moved Ansgar to Mara's Eye Pond.
Fixed a few small AI issues.
